Header: A revolutionary change for the New Year – An assurance from President
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena said yesterday that a revolutionary change in the agro-industry would be made in the New Year. At yesterday’s meeting with Polonnaruwa District farmer’s union representatives, the President said that a large number of changes would take place with the launch of the “national programme entitled ‘three-years in a stable era” which begins today. On this occasion the President said that he hoped for the support of farmer’s with regards to this venture. Several problems faced by the farming community were made known on this occasion to which the president responded that solutions to these issues would be provided through the next series of development plans.
